metadata.title: Pinniped Tagging Records

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC), National Marine Mammal Laboratory (NMML)

metadata.description: Compilation of tags and brands applied  to fur seals, sea lions, and harbor seals in Alaskan and Siberian  waters.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To obtain records of tagged  fur seals, sea lions and harbor seals in Alaskan and Siberian  waters

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
